meanings.sent1: I love looking at the piccy of my family on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She took a piccy of the beautiful sunset at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The piccy of the cat wearing sunglasses made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The piccy of the city skyline was like a window into another world.
meanings.sent5: The piccy of the rainbow was so vivid, it felt like I could touch it.

meanings.definition: A brief or concise statement or summary.
meanings.sent1: Can you give me a piccy of what the meeting was about?
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked for a piccy of the main points in the book.
meanings.sent3: His piccy of the movie plot was so short, it made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her piccy of the problem was like a lightbulb moment for me.
meanings.sent5: The piccy of the recipe made it easy for me to follow along.
